Text: Works fine with Dolphin r7501. Plays a little slow at times, but still very playable. Never drops below 76% except on cut scenes.
Oh, and it is US version as well. Thanks for the upload!

Great torrent. Thanks. I have a request to everyone. Can you upload 2 rare Gamecube games (NTSC-U) Star wars rouge squadron 2: rouge leader and Prince of persia: sands of time in Piratebay. Thx in advance. Both of the games are in IGN's all time 25 best GC games list.
Can anybody tell me what are the minimum system requirements needed to run metroid prime

Playing this game on my Wii with NeoGamma and DiosMiosLite. If you're thinking of doing the same, look out for 2 parts: 
The room with the elevator after beating the first boss (game will freeze if you run in too fast), and the room with a bunch of space pirates that are shooting at a larva (pipe on top floor loads slowly and you will fall through the map if you try to enter it before it has).
